name: Fusion (itch) (MichaelKTaylor)
description:
A platformer of getting from point a to point b by fusing and sacrificing NPC's to get where you need to go.

There were some things that had to be cut due to time, and an over ambitious one person team. But hey, what can you do, right?

Partnered up with Tons of Huns during this jam, check out his stuff. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC9jO_8PiZNkNmGjR0mbBeA

And here's my usual channel. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQmShgdO4Zu2CT1K0Y4J66g
